scripts.say: So this is what has become of the areas occupied by the Sirens... I passed through here scarcely half a month ago, and now...
The Sirens' movements are unpredictable. Who could have foreseen them attacking the same place where we just held our wargames?
Reporting in! Houshou's reconnaissance squad has detected combat activity to 2 o'clock, 10 nautical miles ahead!
Great news. Though I'm not sold on their combat ability, at least these little flying critters are great at reconnaissance. Hehe...
All ships, switch to high alert. Utilize your own best judgment in dealing with incoming Sirens.
